GS24paninixu:80: na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ || PS_1,2.37 ||
GS24paninixu:108: vr̥ddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ || PS_1,2.65 ||
GS24paninixu:172: dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe || PS_1,3.55 ||
GS24paninixu:184: ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne || PS_1,3.67 ||
GS24paninixu:242: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam || PS_1,4.32 ||
GS24paninixu:315: yuṣmady-upapade samāna-adhikaraṇe sthāniny api madhyamaḥ || PS_1,4.105 ||
GS24paninixu:316: prahāse ca manya-upapade manyater uttama ekavac ca || PS_1,4.106 ||
GS24paninixu:441: yasmād adhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvara-vacanaṃ tatra saptamī || PS_2,3.9 ||
GS24paninixu:539: etadas tra-tasos tra-tasau ca anudātau || PS_2,4.33 ||
GS24paninixu:542: ado jagdhir lyap ti kiti || PS_2,4.36 ||
GS24paninixu:589: na avyayībhāvād ato 'm tv apañcamyāḥ || PS_2,4.83 ||
GS24paninixu:598: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samāna-kartr̥kād icchāyāṃ vā || PS_3,1.7 ||
GS24paninixu:603: bhr̥śādibhyo bhuvy-acver lopaś ca halaḥ || PS_3,1.12 ||
GS24paninixu:613: dhātor eka-aco hala-ādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ || PS_3,1.22 ||
GS24paninixu:683: kuṣi-rajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca || PS_3,1.90 ||
GS24paninixu:1053: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīra-sukham || PS_3,3.116 ||
GS24paninixu:1115: kriyāsam-abhihāre loṭ loṭo hi-svau vā ca ta-dhvamoḥ || PS_3,4.2 ||
GS24paninixu:1146: varṣa-pramāṇa ūlopaś ca asya anyatrasyām || PS_3,4.32 ||
GS24paninixu:1183: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akramakebhyaḥ || PS_3,4.69 ||
GS24paninixu:1198: bruvaḥ pañcānām ādita āho bruvaḥ || PS_3,4.84 ||
GS24paninixu:1217: yāsuṭ parasmaipadesu udātto ṅic ca || PS_3,4.103 ||
GS24paninixu:1310: aṇ-iñor anārṣayor guru-upottamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre || PS_4,1.78 ||
GS24paninixu:1393: manor jātāv añ-ayatau ṣuk ca || PS_4,1.161 ||
GS24paninixu:1397: vā anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jivati || PS_4,1.165 ||
GS24paninixu:1467: tad asyāṃ praharaṇam iti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḥ || PS_4,2.57 ||
GS24paninixu:1477: tad asminn asti iti deśe tannāmni || PS_4,2.67 ||
GS24paninixu:1578: sarvatra aṇ ca talopaś ca || PS_4,3.22 ||
GS24paninixu:1623: tasya vyākhyāna iti ca vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ || PS_4,3.66 ||
GS24paninixu:1657: janapadināṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ janapadena samānaśabdānāṃ bahuvacane ||
GS24paninixu:1700: mayaḍ vaā+etayor bhāṣāyām abhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ || PS_4,3.143 ||
GS24paninixu:1727: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam || PS_4,4.2 ||
GS24paninixu:1851: tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ || PS_4,4.125 ||
GS24paninixu:1886: tad asya tad asmin syād iti || PS_5,1.16 ||
GS24paninixu:1920: tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.50 ||
GS24paninixu:1950: tam adhīṣṭo bhr̥to bhūto bhāvī || PS_5,1.80 ||
GS24paninixu:1966: tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat || PS_5,1.96 ||
GS24paninixu:1985: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ || PS_5,1.115 ||
GS24paninixu:2040: inac piṭac cika ci ca || PS_5,2.33 ||
GS24paninixu:2043: tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac || PS_5,2.36 ||
GS24paninixu:2052: tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ || PS_5,2.45 ||
GS24paninixu:2084: tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā || PS_5,2.77 ||
GS24paninixu:2089: tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām || PS_5,2.82 ||
GS24paninixu:2101: tad asya asty asminn iti matup || PS_5,2.94 ||
GS24paninixu:2216: vibhāṣā supo bahuc parastāt tu || PS_5,3.68 ||
GS24paninixu:2240: kiṃ-yat-tado nirdhāraṇe dvayor ekasya ḍatarac || PS_5,3.92 ||
GS24paninixu:2268: pādaśatasya saṅkhyāder vīpsāyāṃ vun lopaś ca || PS_5,4.1 ||
GS24paninixu:2385: añ nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ nasaṃ ca asthūlāt || PS_5,4.118 ||
GS24paninixu:2466: vaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ kiti || PS_6,1.39 ||
GS24paninixu:2527: na āmreḍitasya anatyasya tu vā || PS_6,1.99 ||
GS24paninixu:2704: tavai ca antaś ca yugapat || PS_6,2.51 ||
GS24paninixu:2743: arme ca avarṇam dvyac tryac || PS_6,2.90 ||
GS24paninixu:2886: striyāḥ puṃvad-bhāṣītapuṃskādanūṅ samānādhikaraṇe striyām apūraṇī-priyādiṣu || PS_6,3.34
GS24paninixu:2945: viṣvag-devayoś ca ṭer adry añcatau vapratyaye || PS_6,3.92 ||
GS24paninixu:2952: aṣaṣthy-atr̥tīyāsthasya anayasya dug āśīr-āśā-āsthā-āsthita-utsuka-ūti-kāraka-rāga-ccheṣu arthe vibhāṣā || PS_6,3.100 ||
GS24paninixu:2962: saṅkhyā-vi-sāya-pūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau || PS_6,3.110 ||
GS24paninixu:3036: sanaḥ ktici lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām || PS_6,4.45 ||
GS24paninixu:3099: lopaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ ṃvoḥ || PS_6,4.107 ||
GS24paninixu:3151: bahor lopo bhū ca bahoḥ || PS_6,4.158 ||
GS24paninixu:3335: acas tāsvat thaly aniṭo nityam || PS_7,2.61 ||
GS24paninixu:3395: na y-vābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyām aic || PS_7,3.3 ||
GS24paninixu:3418: ardhāt parimāṇasya pūrvasya tu vā || PS_7,3.26 ||
GS24paninixu:3436: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ata id āpy asupaḥ || PS_7,3.44 ||
GS24paninixu:3465: lug vā duha-diha-liha-guhām ātmanepade dantye || PS_7,3.73 ||
GS24paninixu:3480: na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke || PS_7,3.87 ||
GS24paninixu:3663: gatyartha-loṭā lr̥ṇ na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat || PS_8,1.51 ||
GS24paninixu:3723: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya s-dhvoḥ || PS_8,2.37 ||
GS24paninixu:3728: ra-dābhyāṃ niṣthāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ || PS_8,2.42 ||
GS24paninixu:3766: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ || PS_8,2.80 ||
GS24paninixu:3772: guror anr̥to 'nantyasya apy ekaikasya prācām || PS_8,2.86 ||
GS24paninixu:3793: eco 'pragr̥hyasya adūrādhdūte pūrvasya ardhasya ad uttarasya+idutau ||
GS24paninixu:3826: ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅamuṇ nityam || PS_8,3.32 ||
